settings.title: App Settings
settings.notificationDesc: Get notified when AI finishes working in a chat.
settings.apiConnectionDesc: How your AI agents connect to language models.
settings.oauthDesc: Claude Pro/Max — using your Claude subscription
settings.apiKeyDesc: API Key — Anthropic, OpenRouter, or compatible API

appearanceSettings.title: Appearance
appearanceSettings.toolIconsDesc: Icons shown next to CLI commands in chat activity. Stored in ~/.craft-agent/tool-icons/.

labelsSettings.title: Labels
labelsSettings.aboutLabelsDesc1: Labels help you organize sessions with colored tags. Use them to categorize conversations by project, topic, or priority — making it easy to filter and find related sessions later.
labelsSettings.aboutLabelsDesc2: Each label can optionally carry a value with a specific type (text, number, or date). This turns labels into structured metadata — for example, a "priority" label with value 3, or a "due" label with a date.
labelsSettings.aboutLabelsDesc3: Auto-apply rules assign labels automatically when a message matches a regex pattern. For example, pasting a Linear issue URL can auto-tag the session with the project name and issue ID — no manual tagging needed.
labelsSettings.labelHierarchyDesc: All labels configured for this workspace. Labels can be nested to form groups.
labelsSettings.noLabelsHint: Labels can be created by the agent or by editing labels/config.json in your workspace.
labelsSettings.autoApplyRulesDesc: Regex patterns that automatically apply labels when matched in user messages. For example, paste a Linear issue URL and automatically tag the session with the project name and issue ID.

permissionsSettings.title: Permissions
permissionsSettings.aboutPermissionsDesc1: Permissions control how much autonomy your agent has. In Explore mode, the agent can only read and research — perfect for understanding a problem before committing to changes. When you're ready, switch to Execute mode to let the agent implement the plan autonomously.
permissionsSettings.aboutPermissionsDesc2: A good workflow: start in Explore to let the agent investigate, review the proposed plan, then execute with confidence.
permissionsSettings.defaultPermissionsDesc: App-level patterns allowed in Explore mode. Commands not on this list are blocked.
permissionsSettings.workspaceCustomizationsDesc: Workspace-level patterns that extend the app defaults above.
permissionsSettings.noCustomPermissionsHint: Create a permissions.json file in your workspace to add custom rules.

preferencesSettings.title: Preferences
preferencesSettings.basicInfoDesc: Help Craft Agent personalize responses to you.
preferencesSettings.name: Name
preferencesSettings.nameDesc: How Craft Agent should address you.
preferencesSettings.timezoneDesc: Used for relative dates like 'tomorrow' or 'next week'.
preferencesSettings.preferredLanguageDesc: Preferred language for Craft Agent's responses.
preferencesSettings.locationDesc: Enables location-aware responses like weather, local time, and regional context.
preferencesSettings.cityDesc: Your city for local information and context.
preferencesSettings.countryDesc: Your country for regional formatting and context.
preferencesSettings.notesDesc: Free-form context that helps Craft Agent understand your preferences.
preferencesSettings.notesPlaceholder: Any additional context you'd like Craft Agent to know...

workspaceSettings.title: Workspace Settings
workspaceSettings.name: Name
workspaceSettings.modeCyclingDesc: Select which modes to cycle through with Shift+Tab

onboarding.description: Agents with the UX they deserve. Connect anything. Organize your sessions. Everything you need to do the work of your life!
onboarding.updateDescription: Update your API connection or change your setup.
onboarding.selectPowerMethod: Select how you'd like to power your AI agents.
onboarding.claudeProMaxDesc: Use your Claude subscription for unlimited access.
onboarding.apiKeyDesc: Anthropic, OpenRouter, Ollama, or compatible APIs.
onboarding.copyCodeDesc: Copy the code from the browser page and paste it below.
onboarding.useClaudeSubscription: Use your Claude subscription to power multi-agent workflows.
onboarding.apiConfigDesc: Enter your API key. Optionally configure a custom endpoint for OpenRouter, Ollama, or compatible APIs.
onboarding.startChat: Just start a chat and get to work.

sources.title: Sources
sources.summary: Connect external data like MCP servers, REST APIs, and local filesystems. Sources give your agent tools to access services like GitHub, Linear, or your Obsidian vault.

sourcesApi.title: APIs
sourcesApi.summary: Connect to any REST API with flexible authentication. Make HTTP requests to external services directly from your conversations.

sourcesMcp.title: MCP Servers
sourcesMcp.summary: Connect to Model Context Protocol servers for rich tool integrations. MCP servers provide structured access to services like GitHub, Linear, and Notion.

sourcesLocal.title: Local Folders
sourcesLocal.summary: Give your agent access to local directories like Obsidian vaults, code repositories, or data folders on your machine.

skills.title: Skills
skills.summary: Reusable instruction sets that teach your agent specialized behaviors. Create a SKILL.md file and invoke it with @mention in your messages.

statuses.title: Statuses
statuses.summary: Organize conversations into workflow states like Todo, In Progress, and Done. Open statuses appear in your inbox; closed ones move to the archive.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.summary: Control how much autonomy your agent has. Explore mode is read-only, Ask to Edit prompts before changes, and Execute mode runs without prompts.

labels.title: Labels
labels.summary: Tag sessions with colored labels for organization and filtering. Labels support hierarchical nesting, typed values, and auto-apply rules that extract data from messages using regex patterns.

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.summary: Separate configurations for different contexts like personal projects or work. Each workspace has its own sources, skills, statuses, and session history.

themes.title: Themes
themes.summary: Customize the visual appearance with a 6-color system. Override specific colors in theme.json or install preset themes for complete visual styles.

appSettings.title: App Settings
appSettings.summary: Configure global app settings like your default model, authentication method, and workspace list. Settings are stored in ~/.craft-agent/config.json.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.summary: Personal preferences like your name, timezone, and language that help the agent personalize responses. Stored in ~/.craft-agent/preferences.json.
